Erica Joy Baker (amụrụ n'afo 1980)  bụ onye injinia na mpaghara San Francisco Bay, Onye isi teknụzụ maka Kọmitii Mgbasa Ozi Democratic Congress, ma mara maka nkwado nkwuwa okwu ya nke iche iche na nsonye
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere GitHub,  Google, Slack, Patreon, na Microsoft
Ọ nwetara aha ya na 2015 maka ịmalite akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi dị n'ime ebe ndị ọrụ Google kọrọ data ụgwọ ọnwa ha iji ghọta nke ọma ọdịiche ụgwọ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Kara Swisher nke Recode kpọrọ Baker "nwanyị ga-ekiri" na profaịlụ na C Magazine
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Baker weere klas mmemme ihe mgbako,  na-amụta ka esi eme mmemme na BASIC na Texas Instruments akara mgbako eserese
Ọ mụtakwara ka esi ede koodu webụsaịtị, na-akwado nke ọhụrụ ya na GeoCities
Baker gara na Mahadum Miami wee gụchaa sayensị Kọmputa
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii abụọ nọ na otu n'ime klaasị ya, wee kpebie ịkwaga na Mahadum Alaska na-enweta Associate of apply Science degree in Information Technology
Ọrụ mbụ Baker bụ dịka onye nchịkwa ngalaba Windows maka Mahadum Alaska usoro steeti niile mgbe ọ dị afọ 21
Ọ kwagara n'ụlọ Depot otu afọ, na-arụ ọrụ netwọk na nkwado desktọpụ mkpanaka
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ gbanwere na Egwuregwu Sayensị iji mee nkwado desktọpụ
Baker rụrụ ọrụ na Google site na afọ 2006 ruo afọ 2015, n'ọrụ dị iche iche, na-ejedebe na ọrụ nke Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
Na Julaị 2015, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Google maka Slack, Baker kpughere n'ụdị tweet na ya amalitela mpempe akwụkwọ n'ime Google maka ndị ọrụ iji kpughee ozi ụgwọ ọnwa ha
Dabere na mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ, ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ibe ya nwere ike ịkparịta ụka n'ịkwalite ụgwọ ọrụ
Baker kọrọ na ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ibe ya zigara ndị ọgbọ ya ego maka ịmalite akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, mana ndị njikwa anabataghị ego ndị ọgbọ ya
Mpempe akwụkwọ a kpalitere mkparịta ụka na ndịiche n'ụgwọ ọrụ Google, enweghị nghọta na mkpebi ịkwụ ụgwọ, yana ndịiche okike na agbụrụ nwere ike ịkwụ
A nọgidere na-emelite akwụkwọ mpịakọta ahụ ruo afọ 2017, mgbe a na-akọ data emelitere site na akwụkwọ akụkọ na New York Times
Site na Mee 2015 ruo Julaị 2017, Baker rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nrụpụta na ntọhapụ na Slack
Na Febụwarị 2016, Baker, Megan Anctil, Kiné Camara, na Duretti Hirpa nabatara onyinye TechCrunch 's Crunchies n'aha Slack for Fastest Rising Startup

Na June 2017, TechCrunch, na USA Today kọrọ na Baker na-ahapụ Slack ka ọ sonyere Kickstarter dị ka onye nduzi nke injinịa, na-akọ na Lara Hogan, onye VP nke Engineering a họpụtara ọhụrụ, na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya agụnyeghị ụdịrị dị iche iche na nsonye n'ihu ọha, Baker kwuru na ịkwalite ụdị dị iche iche na nsonye ga-abụ akụkụ nke ọrụ ya
Agbanyeghị, ọ mechara nọrọ na mpaghara San Francisco Bay wee bụrụ onye isi njikwa injinia na Patreon
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Baker sonyeere Microsoft ka onye isi njikwa injinia otu
Na Maachị 2021, Baker sonyeere DCCC ka onye isi teknụzụ
Mgbe emechara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na data ụgwọ ọnwa Google wee hapụ Google, Baker abụrụla onye na-akwado ụdị dị iche iche na nsonye na blọọgụ ya na n'ihu ọha ndị ọzọ
Ọ nọ n'azụ #RealDiversityNumbers, otu Twitter iji nweta ọnụọgụ maka ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche gburugburu njide na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ikpe kwụsịrị n'ụlọ ikpe
Baker na-akatọ okwu Salesforce.com CEO Marc Benioff nke na-atụ aro na ntinye ntinye maka ndị agbụrụ na agbụrụ na-ewere azụ azụ ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwee ike ilekwasị anya n'ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị
Ọ kọwapụtara n'ụzọ dị egwu nke teknụzụ teknụzụ mgbe ọ katọrọ tweet Benioff n'oge ngagharị iwe Black Lives Matter, ebe a na-ejide onye isi ojii nke yi akara twitter
tweet ya kwuru, "Ee nke ahụ bụ akara @Twitter @blackbirds
Ọ dị ịtụnanya ịhụ teknụzụ dịka ụgbọ maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha

Nkwanye ugwu.", nke ọ zara, sị, "Na onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịhụ foto nke onye isi ojii a na-ejide maka ime mkpesa megide ogbugbu nke onye isi ojii ọzọ na-ezighị ezi wee zaa, 'Hey lee anya Twitter logo', ga-abụ ihe na-agwụ ike ma ọ bụrụ na o mere ebe ọ bụla ọzọ
N'ime ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ, ọ dabara maka usoro ahụ."
Ọ katọkwara usoro vidiyo nke Elissa Shevinsky, onye edemede nke Lean Out, na-ekwupụta na ọ na-ekwu naanị banyere nsogbu dị iche iche n'elu
Meredith L
Patterson weghaara okwu Baker ebubo ma bo ya ebubo na ọ nwere esemokwu mmasị
Baker, tinyere Tracy Chou, Freada Kapor Klein na Ellen Pao, bụ otu n'ime ndị ntọala nke Project gụnyere, mmalite mmalite na 2016 iji nye usoro dị iche iche na ntinye aka na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahịa
Baker gbara ajụjụ ọnụ site na WIRED's Davey Alba na WIRED Business Conference 2016
Na Jenụwarị 2017, Baker bụ onye isi okwu na Women of Color in Computing ogbako nke Mills College nwere
Na Maachị 2018, Baker bụ ọkà okwu pụtara na Mgbakọ Bond
Baker bụkwa onye na-ekwu okwu maka Berkeley Center maka New Media panel na The Wall Street Journal ' s Women in the Workplace Forum na October 2018
Ọ pụtara na Jeopardy dị ka onye ngosi ọbịa na February 2021
Baker nọ na ndị isi oche maka Girl Develop It
Ọ nọkwa na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ nke Hack the Hood ma bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ maka koodu nwa agbọghọ ojii
Baker nọ na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị 100 BBC mara ọkwa na 23 Nọvemba 2020
Baker nọrọ na nwata ya na njem, nke mbụ na Germany, ebe a mụrụ Baker mgbe a na-ebuga ndị mụrụ ya n'ebe ahụ, na New Mexico, Florida, na Alaska
Ndị mụrụ ya abụọ nọ na US Air Force
Baker malitere ide ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Baker lụrụ mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji na Alaska, mana o kwuru na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ
Na 2021, Baker lụrụ di ya nke ka noo ugbu a, American B Astrella.
Baker nwere mmasị siri ike na usoro ọmụmụ, ma nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ iri nyocha akụkọ banyere ezinụlọ ya
Olileanya ya bụ otu ụbọchị inye aka mejupụta oghere maka ezinaụlọ America ọ bụla ọzọ kwa
